name: Iterate
description:
UE4 Summer Game Jam 2019 Submission on theme "Make it count"

Top-down 3D Puzzle, where you should sacrifice your life to advance from level to level. Iterate and overcome the challanges!

Made by:

  • Alex Gertsev
  • Daria Ipatieva
  • Eldar Tagirov
  • Nikita Smirnov
  • Vasili Kandratsiuk
